vsParam:
Um, Bilberry...
We've got rid of those Goblins...

Oh, thank you!
It's a great help!

In the Albus region, what we treasure most is the natural environment
on this island. We'll pass it on to our posterity no matter what.

... Bilberry.
Why did you come to the Albus region in the first place?

You were the emperor of Ateria, weren't you?
I think these two regions are totally different.
He was the Lord there, not emperor...

Hahaha, pretty much the same.
I did quite a lot of awful things back in Ateria.
â€” I moved to Albus for some reason after that.

I saw the splendid scenery here and sighed with
mixed feelings, "Ah, my life was so unfulfilling..."

It's more meaningful to enjoy the beautiful scenery here
rather than fighting. ... After that, I decided to move here.

I see... Yeah, I'm with you! It feels better
to get along with people rather than argue with them!

Haha, I'm glad to hear that.
That's why I'm determined to protect the nature here... Oh!

Hey! How dare you throw litter about! It'll do damage
to the nature and you'll be sorry for that! Stop there!!

He... He's already gone... Ah haha,
Bilberry in the emperor mode is so threatening.

Haha, yeah... We don't have to worry about the nature
of Albus as long as he's here? Haha!
